```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
#install.packages("jsonlite")
library(jsonlite)
business <- stream_in(file("business.json"),pagesize = 10000)
write.csv(business, file="business.csv")

B_c1<-subset(business,business$state=="FL")
write.csv(B_c1, file="B_c1.csv")
data<-read.csv("B_c1.csv",header = F)


data<-subset(data,data[6]=="FL")
B_c2<-data[-1]

B_c2<-B_c2[,c(1:11,20,22,27,28,29,33)]


business_FL<-na.omit(B_c2)

business_FL<-business_FL[-1,]

names(business_FL)=c(	"business_id",	"name",	"address", "city",	"state",	"postal_code",	"latitude",	"longitude",	"stars",	"review_count",	"is_open",	"attributes.WiFi",	"attributes.WheelchairAccessible"	,"attributes.DogsAllowed",	"attributes.Alcohol",	"attributes.GoodForKids",	"attributes.RestaurantsGoodForGroups")


write.csv(business_FL, file="business_FL.csv")
```
